response.overview: After graduating from Emory University in 1992, top student and athlete Christopher McCandless abandons his possessions, gives his entire $24,000 savings account to charity, and hitchhikes to Alaska to live in the wilderness.
response.tagline: Into the heart. Into the soul.
response.title: Into the Wild

titles.title: In die Wildnis - Allein nach Alaska
Into the Wild - Die Geschichte eines Aussteigers
